General.Name: China Coal Xinji Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: China Coal Xinji Energy Co.,Ltd engages in mining, washing, and sales of bituminous and anthracite coal in China and internationally. It is also involved in the thermal power generation; hotel and catering business; property management; and electricity and heat production and supply. The company was formerly known as SDIC Xinji Energy Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Coal Xinji Energy Co.,Ltd in January 2017. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Huainan, China.
General.Address: Xinji Energy Office Park, Huainan, China, 232001
